title: Finally! We are going to have SO much MILK!

subtasks: Searching for a suitable breeding bull
Ensuring the bull calf does not become overly affectionate
Providing shelter and care for cows and the bull calf

tasks.task: Raising and caring for cows. Under this, there are several subtasks. They had to search for a suitable breeding bull, so that's one subtask. Feeding the young bull calf is another. There's a mention of hand-feeding the calf, which might be a subtask. Also, they have to prevent the calf from becoming too affectionate, which could be a challenge. So handling the bull's behavior is a task.

subtasks: Searching for a suitable breeding bull
Ensuring appropriate behavior (handling) in the bull calf
Providing shelter and care for the animals
Managing a small dairy farm to support increased milk production needs
